name: Dr. Osthimer

ingredients.item: 6 Mint sprigs; 4 dashes of Angostura bitters

preparation:
This shaken cocktail has just enough citrus to brighten up the sweet flavor profile. It’s precisely what the doctor ordered.

Add all ingredients to a shaker, and dry-shake (without ice), then shake with ice.

Double-strain into a sherbet glass.

Garnish with 6 mint sprigs and 4 dashes of Angostura bitters.
